meta.label: Compute sentence embeddings
meta.description: This recipe creates sentence embeddings for the texts in a given column. The sentence embeddings are obtained from pre-trained word vectors (like word2vec, fastText, glove) using one of the following two aggregation methods: a simple average aggregation (by default) or a weighted aggregation (so-called SIF embeddings).

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Input dataset
inputRoles.description: The dataset that contains the column of interest

inputRoles.name: embedding_folder
inputRoles.label: Embedding folder
inputRoles.description: The folder containing the pre-trained word embeddings

outputRoles.name: output_dataset
outputRoles.label: Output dataset
outputRoles.description: A copy of the input dataset with an additional column of sentence embeddings

params.name: embedding_is_custom
params.label: Use custom embedding
params.description: Tick this box if you are using a custom embedding.

params.name: advanced_settings
params.label: Advanced Settings
params.description: To set SIF smoothing parameters and number of components.

params.name: n_principal_components
params.label: [SIF] Principal Components
params.description: Number of components to remove in SIF computation.
